description: Sample query policy that will run two queries and email the results as per the template configuration.

queries.name: docker-images
queries.description: Find all running Docker image based containers
queries.sql: select * from application_detail where running_instances > 0 and requested_state = 'started' and image is not null

queries.name: all-apps-pushed-and-still-running-in-the-last-week
queries.description: Find all running applications pushed in the last week not including the system organization
queries.sql: select * from application_detail where running_instances > 0 and requested_state = 'started' and week(last_pushed) = week(current_date) -1 AND year(last_pushed) = year(current_date) and organization not in ('system')

email-notification-template.subject: Query Policy Sample Report
email-notification-template.body: Results are herewith attached for your consideration.
